channel.title: Airtable on Jamstack Themes
channel.description: Recent content in Airtable on Jamstack Themes

item.title: Airtable listing theme for Gatsby
item.description: Airtable listing theme for Gatsby Features Integration with Airtable Item details displayed in a modal with navigation (previous / next) Responsive/adaptive images via gatsby-image Uses utility-first TailwindCSS framework Responsive design (desktop / mobile) Generic newsletter form

item.title: Gridsome Airtable Starter
item.description: Airtable starter for Gridsome This starter is meant to act as a starting point/example for connecting Gridsome with Airtable.
